Command.help: Type of command to send to the product

Destination selector.help: This parameter determines to which part of a system the command is targeted. To control an audio product, select "Audio Source". To control a video product, select "Video Source". If you only want to operate the audio source of a video product without affecting the video source, use "Audio Source". If the video product has a B&O VCR or a second DVD player attached to the SCART or other input connectors, use V.TAPE\V.MEM.

Command.help: Type of command to send to the product

Destination selector.help: This parameter determines to which part of a system the command is targeted. To control an audio product, select "Audio Source". To control a video product, select "Video Source". If you only want to operate the audio source of a video product without affecting the video source, use "Audio Source". If the video product has a B&O VCR or a second DVD player attached to the SCART or other input connectors, use V.TAPE\V.MEM.

Link.help: This is only necessary for sources that have a local source, to distinguish between the local and the remote source. It may also be required for controlling products in OPTION 4.

Secondary source.help: Indicates if the source to control is a secondary source (V.TAPE2 / DVD2 / V.MEM2). If this is the case then Destination selector should be set to V.TAPE/V.MEM, and Secondary source to V.TAPE2 / DVD2 / V.MEM2

Command.help: Type of command to send to the product

Network source.help: This is only necessary for sources that have a local source, to distinguish between the local and the remote source. It may also be required for controlling products in OPTION 4.

commandSpecs.help:
This resource type represents a KNX group address of type boolean (1 Bit).
 It is recommended to use Button, Toggle or GPIO instead.
 The group address C and T flags must be set in order to get feedback, and W flag must be set in order to control the device.
commandSpecs.name: SET

commandSpecs.help:
This resource type represents a KNX group address of type integer within [0..255].
 The group address C and T flags must be set in order to get feedback, and W flag must be set in order to control the device.
commandSpecs.name: SET

VALUE.help: Change boolean group address value to [0..255].

commandSpecs.help:
This resource type represents a KNX group address of type integer within [-128..127].
 The group address C and T flags must be set in order to get feedback, and W flag must be set in order to control the device.
commandSpecs.name: SET

VALUE.help: Change boolean group address value to [-128..127].

commandSpecs.help:
This resource type represents a KNX group address of type integer within [0..65535].
 The group address C and T flags must be set in order to get feedback, and W flag must be set in order to control the device.
commandSpecs.name: SET

VALUE.help: Change boolean group address value to [0..65535].

commandSpecs.help:
This resource type represents a KNX group address of type integer within [-32768..32767].
 The group address C and T flags must be set in order to get feedback, and W flag must be set in order to control the device.
commandSpecs.name: SET

VALUE.help: Change boolean group address value to [-32768..32767].

commandSpecs.help:
This resource type represents a KNX group address of type integer within [0..15].
 The group address C and T flags must be set in order to get feedback, and W flag must be set in order to control the device.
commandSpecs.name: SET

VALUE.help: Change boolean group address value to [0..15].
